trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_00<tab>Wheiskaet would first like to verify that you are not a complete fraud.

TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_01<tab>Before he bothers giving you a truly demanding task, Wheiskaet would first have you attend to a simple one. Place the herring he has given you on an eastern cape near Costa del Sol to lure out the nix that has been seen in the vicinity.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_02<tab>Having baited the trap with your herring, all that remains is to wait for and slay the nix that comes forth to claim it.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_03<tab>You dispatch the slimy creature with great fanfare and sever one of its legs as proof of your kill. Show Wheiskaet that the deed is done.

TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_04<tab>Wheiskaet explains that a recent incident with a former employee has forced him to treat strangers with greater caution. Having proven yourself to be nothing like that other poor, unfortunate soul, he is now willing to give you a challenge as befits your talents.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_00<tab>Use the herring to lure out the nix.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait for the nix.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the nix leg to Wheiskaet.

TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_000<tab>Master Gegeruju's requests can be more demanding than you realize. Before I set you to your true task, I would like to verify that this won't be a waste of my time.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_001<tab>A nix has recently been seen prowling the beach to the east. As you can imagine, my master does not want large slimy creatures anywhere near his lands.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_002<tab>The beast is cunning, but you should have no difficulty luring it out with herring.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_003<tab>Slay the nix and return to me. Oh, and don't forget to bring me a leg as proof of the kill.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_020<tab>Well? Did you deal with the nix?

TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_025<tab>Lest you think me overly cautious for testing you in this way, you should know that we had an incident not long ago. A foolish young employee was dismissed for lying about his past. He claimed to have served in the Company of Heroes, but I knew for a fact he did not.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_026<tab>Anyway, now that the pointless busywork is finished, I shall give you a challenge as befits your talents.
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>Ripples in the water catch your eye...
